proposal: Diving into virtual lands and trading NFTs with AxaCoin sounds like the future we all dreamed of. Congrats on uniting 251 visionaries on the ETH network! 🌍 If you're looking to spice up the AxaCoin universe with more engagement, why not let your community create their own DEX or host a blockchain lottery? It's all about giving power back to the players. Let's make the metaverse even more dynamic together.
